name: Nepali Text To Speech
tagline: Nepali text to speech is web based tool that reads Devanagari Unicode and plays appropriate sound
body:
### Welcome to Nepali Text To Speech.
This text to speech is the easiest way to change Devanagari Unicode to appropriate speech. Your copy here [from GitHub](https://github.com/AnupRaj/NepaliTextToSpeech), fork it, start it or simply watch it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
